001.name: CrewOne
001.text: Hello there! Nice to meet ya again.

002.name: CrewOne
002.text: The Commander sent you to me, right?

003.name: CrewOne
003.text: Here’s what we need to do.

004.name: CrewOne
004.text: We need to install these modules to the weapons docked in their stations.

005.name: CrewOne
005.text: The search party will be needing these in case they encounter anything hostile.
